Package com.researchspace.repository.spi

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IDepositor
    Represents user information to supply to the repository.
    IRepository
    Top level interface for data repository integration.
    RepositoryConfigurer
    Returns information about how the deposit can be configured by the client.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ExternalId
    An external identifier e.g.
    License
    A License.
    LicenseConfigInfo
    Encapsulates information about what license information is needed.
    LicenseDef
    A definition of a license, an immutable value object.
    LicenseDefs
    Definitions of commonly used licenses
    RepoPropertyValue  
    RepositoryConfig
    Configures the server, apikey and repository alias
    RepositoryOperationResult
    For service operations that return a Boolean indicating success/failure, it can be useful to return an entity back to the controller layer as well.
    StubRepositoryImpl
    Default do-nothing implementation useful for test environments or test servers when there is no 'real' data repository to connect to.
    Subject
    Encapsulates a subject or category
    SubmissionMetadata
    Minimal set of information to make a submission to a repository.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    IdentifierScheme
    Schemes for external user identification mechanisms.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    RepositoryDepositException
    Wraps underlying thrown data repository exceptions
